CakeData

Contains the data loading and retrieval routines for the web-accessible data files for Cake.

Summary
CakeDataContains the data loading and retrieval routines for the web-accessible data files for Cake.
cake_location
Data Variables and Functions
Variables
cake_effect_modifiers_cacheContains a map of overridden formulas for effects.
cake_item_modifiers_cacheContains a map of overridden formulas for items.
cake_locations_cacheContains the location data loaded into memory.
Functions
cake_can_load_mapsThis returns true if the data library can download the maps automatically from the Subversion server.
cake_load_effect_modifiers_cacheEnsures that the cake_effect_modifiers_cache is populated from the map in the data directory.
cake_load_item_modifiers_cacheEnsures that the cake_item_modifiers_cache is populated from the map in the data directory.
cake_load_locations_cacheEnsures the cake location data is loaded into memory and potentially download from the server.

cake_location

Data Variables and Functions

Summary
Variables
cake_effect_modifiers_cacheContains a map of overridden formulas for effects.
cake_item_modifiers_cacheContains a map of overridden formulas for items.
cake_locations_cacheContains the location data loaded into memory.
Functions
cake_can_load_mapsThis returns true if the data library can download the maps automatically from the Subversion server.
cake_load_effect_modifiers_cacheEnsures that the cake_effect_modifiers_cache is populated from the map in the data directory.
cake_load_item_modifiers_cacheEnsures that the cake_item_modifiers_cache is populated from the map in the data directory.
cake_load_locations_cacheEnsures the cake location data is loaded into memory and potentially download from the server.

Variables

cake_effect_modifiers_cache

string [effect, string] cake_effect_modifiers_cache

Contains a map of overridden formulas for effects.  This is keyed off the effect and modifier name.

cake_item_modifiers_cache

string [item, string] cake_item_modifiers_cache

Contains a map of overridden formulas for items.  This is keyed off the item and modifier name.

cake_locations_cache

cake_location [string] cake_locations_cache

Contains the location data loaded into memory.

Functions

cake_can_load_maps

boolean cake_can_load_maps()

This returns true if the data library can download the maps automatically from the Subversion server.  This can be set by changing the zlib variable “cake_map_downloads” to false.  Calling this script directly will force the download of the map file.

cake_load_effect_modifiers_cache

void cake_load_effect_modifiers_cache()

Ensures that the cake_effect_modifiers_cache is populated from the map in the data directory.  This will, if it is the first time in a session, attempt to download from the server to update it.

cake_load_item_modifiers_cache

void cake_load_item_modifiers_cache()

Ensures that the cake_item_modifiers_cache is populated from the map in the data directory.  This will, if it is the first time in a session, attempt to download from the server to update it.

cake_load_locations_cache

void cake_load_locations_cache()

Ensures the cake location data is loaded into memory and potentially download from the server.
